@fergalreid @NaomiMc It's not getting media attention but their have been petitions Legal sources claim out rate would match the rest of the EU if divorce was more accessible. 1 year to get a divorce in U.K. Realistically 5 in Ireland

@noodlemaz @NaomiMc @fergalreid Over 90% of the time it is the mothers that stay at home. CRO shows that mothers earn 14% less than their male counterparts. It could say parent Economicslly parents would be too far

@fergalreid @noodlemaz @NaomiMc Family is a married couple though. This is their to recognise the importance of the work mothers do in the home for their children We earn 14% less because of the choice to have children

@watbanner @mickeyhynes I'm one of these liberals I just think a straight literal read is not how the constitution is meant to be interpreted. Yes say parent and yes update it but no to it's so sexist and says that women should be in the home It allows them the choice and recognises their importance
@fergalreid @noodlemaz @NaomiMc Families are protected but they're defined in case law as a married family This gives rights to single mothers.
@fergalreid @NaomiMc There have been discussions that our rate is low because people separate instead Some chattter though online and with some minsters though
@fergalreid @NaomiMc Surely there is more a need for a shorter weight period for divorce. A more human need than a spin need
@fergalreid @NaomiMc Is going to be removed though or replaced ? I'd rather they were looking at Divorce.

@fergalreid @NaomiMc Love parent allowance, cu liens allowance, back to school allowance would be derived from this though. We could change it to person ... but leg would have to require benefits would only be for one parent
@NaomiMc @fergalreid Yea but it's not actually keeping women in the home it's there for protection of their choice to care for their children https://t.co/L5FgCQxouv

Before everyone bangs on about Ireland is a disgrace Yay for women in the home referendum please read below and note that it was viewed as protection I.E. govs duty in the constitution to provide mothers with support and not make them work where there wished to stay at home https://t.co/EQl91rxTCa
